content: this pattern has a video tutorial to accompany right https //youtu be/ijoqpvojdms left https //youtu be/pxvnewcel_u standing promotion on all written patterns all of the time why just buy one get more patterns and save more buy 2 for 20% off buy 3 for 30% off buy 4 or more for 40% off material any weight yarn with recommended hook i used 1850 yds without fringe 6mm hook - lionbrand zztwist gauge not necessary abbreviations chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet bpsc - back post single_crochet skip - skip space - space sts - stitches sizes available one size neckline to wrist - approx 24 inches can be modified smaller or larger youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucu27-xjgrqpr3pxsngbi3ig like us on facebook https //www facebook com/jolieknotscrochet/ view_public_f… join the jolie knots crochet community facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/2541380872756259/ instagram https //www instagram com/jolieknotscrochet/ hl=en
